channel.title: Workstation on Dustin Pedlow
channel.description: Recent content in Workstation on Dustin Pedlow

item.title: My Workstation
item.description: This is a very in depth breakdown of my workstation. I had originally had this article as bunch of mini articles and lists but it took up too much space on my website and I didn’t like having tons of articles related to my workstation. Desktop Gnome shell: Colliod-Dark-Dracula Icons: EPapirus-Dark Appications User Themes: Colloid-Dracula-Dark Gnome Extensions: Bitcoin Markets, Dash to Dock, Mullvad Indicator and User Themes Shortcuts I have made many shortcuts to make my Gnome desktop to switch workspaces and open commonly used applications.
